items.name: Iron Sword
items.description: A sturdy iron sword with a well-worn hilt. The blade shows signs of use but remains sharp. Good for combat.

items.name: Bread

items.name: Rusty Key
items.description: An old, rusty key with intricate engravings that have been worn down by time. The metal is pitted and discolored, but the key still seems functional. It might open something important.
